europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 5. Types of the Pittidae
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Dickinson E.C.
Dekker R.W.R.J.
Eck S.

Violani C.

europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Pittidae
pittas
types
europeana:record.dc:description: A list of 126 names applied to Asian forms of species of pitta (Family Pittidae) is provided, with information on the whereabouts of type-specimens. Where our information does not include reliable data we provide notes to explain the deficit and to stimulate others to offer additional data or sources of information.
europeana:record.dcterms:alternative: Corrigenda published in ZV 335 (2001) p. 235, in: Zoologische Mededelingen 80-5 (2006), p. 315 and in: Corrigenda published in ZV 344 (2003), p. 117
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 5. Types of the Pittidae (Volume 331)
